website_summaries.verdict: A reliable archway that you can use again and again.
pros: Adjustable poles are both durable and flexible
Can fit a range of different sized tables
Kit includes 50 balloon clips, poles, 2 table locks, and an air pump
Quality arch can be reused at future events
cons: Arch does not come with assembly instructions

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Easy to put together. You can adjust the size if needed. Gave a great finishing touch. Family is already requesting to borrow it for their birthday parties.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of two

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I ever used ballon arch kit they were great ..I had planned on using it on a 6 foot table but when I got to the event it was 4 ft table but it worked out great .just look at picture. I recommend these to anyone they are so easy to set up and use ..it took time to blow up all the balloons but it was well worth it .will but from them again .5 stars all the way .
customer_reviews.author: donny

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as hoped. I suggest purchasing balloon clips, it comes with sticky dots but the clips are so much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! The pink and white balloons we did for our daughter's birthday with this arch kit were beautiful. It was very easy to use; however, we had a slight issue with the clamps that came with the kit. While they are adjustable, our table was too thick to use them so we had to put the arch on our kitchen island. This was only a small issue and we are otherwise very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: This worked very well, easy to setup, I didn’t need to buy and extra balloon clips, the ones it came with were plenty. I’m not sure he exact amount of balloons it took, however, it was less than 100. I hooked it to a 6.5’ white folding table- the heavy plastic kind and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Love this product very easy to put together. I will definitely be purchasing another one. Was even able to use the clear sticks to make columns
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No instructions but easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and I haven’t added balloons yet as my party is next weekend but I can’t wait to use this product for my daughters 3rd birthday. It came with the balloon connectors and I ordered extra just in case but the pipe is of good quality and the clamps hold well to the table.
customer_reviews.author: MJM

customer_reviews.title: The worst product ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never been so disappointed in an Amazon order. There were no instructions, I attempted to contact the company per the request that comes with the product but their website does not work. The tubes have no give in them there for they do not arch , more like a slight curve. I need an arch. I went with this product because the description stated that the arch was adjustable. I want my money and time back. I don't have time to order another product from another vendor. I am livid.
customer_reviews.author: lt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This arch worked out perfect! I was nervous based on reviews I read but decided to give it a shot anyway. I used the clips that came with it. Very easy to put together. I had no issues with mine coming apart and there was a relatively strong breeze on the day of the party. We got a lot of compliments on it. The first picture is from the actual event. The second picture was the trial run I did after receiving the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Siegrist

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase-it added such character as well as ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase-it added such character as well as a focal point for my parties. I used it twice in 2 weeks. Once for my daughter's baby shower, and the other for my 4th of July party. The tubes did want to come apart on one side until it was connected together- but overall it was great. You wouldnt think the tubes are bendable when taking them out of the box- but they certainly are. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hemingway

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come with instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time. The product itself is okay, however, it doesn't come with instructions, you have to go to the website and enter all of your personal information to receive to PDF link for the instructions. Absolutely irritating! I'll figure it out myself.
customer_reviews.author: Philip and Lea

customer_reviews.title: How is this an arch?
customer_reviews.text: The balloons turned out cute but I just ended up leaving them as straight lines of balloons because the poles are straight and your YouTube video skips over the part that would tell you how to make the straight poles into an actual arch. The man in the video literally pumps up balloons, puts them on the poles, places the clamps on the tables, and then magically he has an archway??? What??? How does that happen? And even the YouTube comments go, "But how do you make the arch?" but there is no answer. Anyways, at least it came on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GET IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this. EVERYONE at the baby shower wanted to know how we did it. It did not take as many balloons as I thought. And it took 3 of us maybe 20 to 25 minutes to set up. It's really easy. I thought it would take way longer for how awesome it ends up looking. It really put that perfect touch on the baby shower where people were like woah. And it was windy and did fine in the wind! We did not use the little sticky things that it came with. I will be keeping and reusing.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this broke the first time I used it. The table clip snapped and is not repairable. I ordered this months in advance to be sure I had it for the party so I wasn’t able to return. It looked really cool for the couple moments it was up until the clip broke and the popping flung up. I wish the table clamps were better because this really is a cool idea and my child and I were truly very upset that it broke. :-/
customer_reviews.author: Alairia

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend buying a balloon buddy or something else to blow ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for our little boy's bday party. We used on a 6-foot table and were able to adjust the height. Didn't take long to put together at all!!! I highly recommend buying a balloon buddy or something else to blow up the balloons quickly. This is a great product and such an easy way to WOW your guests! It is also reusable which is a big plus. Most importantly, my little boy LOVED it!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Tambourine

customer_reviews.title: Rainbow Arch
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying it, but finally did and I am glad I did. Easy to assemble and work with (do no bend individual tubes). I put packaging tape on the tubes that would be bending (on the top of the arch) for extra security. It did however become loose and some balloons popped but I think it’s bc I didn’t tighten the ends to the table well enough. Overall happy and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble!
customer_reviews.text: This balloon arch is super easy to assemble! A little time consuming if you don't have an electric pump to inflate the balloons (maybe around 70), but I'm not rating based on the time to inflate them. After the balloons were inflated it took about 20 minutes to assemble and set it up. It was able to easily attach to our party table, and it stayed the whole night. I definitely want to thank customers that offered their advice in these reviews. We used tape instead of the adhesive dots to stick the poles together, so it was easy to take down and repack. Overall, we're happy it was easy to use and that it's reusable!
customer_reviews.author: Thanh N.

customer_reviews.title: Not That Hard, Very Cute End Result
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! Everyone loved the tower for the baby shower. Took 2 hours to assemble though. Ended up buying my own little pump from Party City to make the time go by faster. The longest part was blowing up the balloons and attaching them to the ring. Attaching the sticks & putting them on the arch was a piece of cake. The arch may seem like it doesn’t bend but trust me they do. I definitely recommend this, everyone at the shower was taking pictures with it!
customer_reviews.author: LNV

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Easy and will make you look like an expert.
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest way to make a balloon arch. It takes just a few min to put together once you have Inflated the balloons (I recommend you purchase an electric pump if you don’t have one) it was way faster than I thought and made me look like an expert, lol. Everybody kept complementing the arch and my son was beyond happy. It’s sturdy and I’ve saved all the pieces for next party. Great value for your money!
customer_reviews.author: KlaudiaG

customer_reviews.title: Makes a beautiful statement balloon arch.
customer_reviews.text: This balloon arch worked out perfect for my daughters birthday party. My only complaint is that I received 11 plastic tubes instead of 12. It worked out anyway as you can see in the picture it still made a nice size arch. I didn’t need to use the glue dots that came with this set to hold tubes together. I love that they send balloon clips too. I was able to easily assemble and disassemble for reuse of another party. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Yajaira

customer_reviews.title: Great and Easy Arch!
customer_reviews.text: This product was perfect for the balloon Arch I was going for, to my surprise it also includes a hand pump which was nice to have Incase I ever need it, it also came with a bunch of balloon clips and what seemed like glue dots to put between the connection of the sticks but I did not use them, it’s good to have just Incase but it stayed in place just by connecting them on their own, and the balloon clips I also did not use. I just placed the balloons in between.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Get this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the best thing I've ever bought for parties. Once you figure out how to set it up a few times it get's easier. I get soo many compliments at parties and noone believes we did it ourselves. Def must have if you throw a lot of parties or need it for a special occasion. Would def reccomend getting the electric air pump too!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie@87

customer_reviews.title: Need to improve clamps
customer_reviews.text: Was a little difficult to assemble and keep together we taped poles together and the plastic piece to crank to hold onto table broke. Was able to fix with things at home. But overall concept not bad. Need to use higher quality clamps for sure
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Cute for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this expecting to use it for multiple parties. The directions arent very helpful but it’s pretty straightforward to figure out. One of the plastic poles shattered while we were attaching it to the table, I was able to duck tape it enough to use it for the party but it’s too broken to save once we take it down. Cute for the money but disappointed it broke setting up.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This kit was very easy to use! It doesn’t look sturdy at all, but it held up well and I imagine it will be around for many other parties. I used about 70 balloons for this arch.
customer_reviews.author: A. D

customer_reviews.title: Not a superior design
customer_reviews.text: The connection pieces for the arch did not bend well when trying to build the arch so some of my connection pieces were bent and it wasn’t a perfectly smooth arch. Seems like some pieces should have had a pre-bend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Center of attention
customer_reviews.text: Setup took about an hour, and that was including the time it took to inflate the balloons with an electric air pump. We used sixty 11" latex balloons and that was perfect. Our ceiling is a little low, so I used all but one piece of the connector tubes. Everyone raved about how gorgeous the arch was, and people asked where I bought it. I highly recommended it to all of our guests!
customer_reviews.author: keto.anghellic

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad we bought this! It comes with plenty of rings, a manual pump, and was pretty easy to put together. Be sure you have a tall ceiling unless you're putting it on a lower than normal table. I used 86 12" balloons. It was well worth the effort put into it for the impact it had!
customer_reviews.author: Autra

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, perfect size for table
customer_reviews.text: It works!! Easy to set up (depending on your table type) and perfect size for the table. The glue dots helped keep everything in place, very very strong. I used glue dots on the clamps attached to the table too for added grip. It worked well! Managed to pull some parts apart after the event to reuse in the future. Reccommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jaewonywon

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: I sincerely had buyers remorse after purchasing this. I was afraid it was going to be totally corny, BUT it turns out it was a great purchase! This small touch added so much character to our event. It was relatively easy to install. It took at least two of us to hold it up and attach it to the table, but it was so pretty once we got it up!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Perrodin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and sturdy. The pic is only little crooked because of uneven surfaces that we used to attach the arch. Only complaint is that the little pieces of the rod you piece together don’t have very snug fit. So when trying to carry it all together, they easily came apart and the balloons would fall off. Other than that. Great. And the balloon pumps super helpful
customer_reviews.author: fesneurad

customer_reviews.title: This is a MUST for your party or events.
customer_reviews.text: Best thing to create an arch with balloons. I received a lot of compliments of my arch at my party. Nobody believed when I said I did it by myself. It’s very easy to use, you can use it for a lot of events, and the material is good and clear which is perfect to decor with any color. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it! You wont be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This made my life so much easier. It was the hit of the party. I will be able to use it for so many parties. I might even get a second one! I got this because I was practicing a balloon arch with just ribbon..it ended up looking like a cloud lol this arch we assembled at the party with balloons we had already blown up at home and just brought to the event! I love that this came with everything you need!
customer_reviews.author: NHA

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for outdoor
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately it didn’t sustain windy weather in Florida. It Is probably meant for indoor only. Ruined my plans for the party... had to throw it away and it also bended the side of the table where it was hooked. Giving 3 stars because it is pretty inexpensive but definitely not sturdy...
customer_reviews.author: Dora Holdarova

customer_reviews.title: Awesome decoration for birthday cake table
customer_reviews.text: Awesome decoration for birthday cake table. I used 75 of the 12 inch balloons and my husband and I blew them up ourselves the day of the party. Arch can be set up the day before the party. We got lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Liechty

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this product! I bought this to save me money on ordering a balloon arch for my sons 1st birthday. Wasn’t even able to take a decent picture because it begin to detach even if I put the double sided tape it provided, plastic tubes started breaking. It was just horrible and embarrassing trying to fix it every 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: Reusable & easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, I recommend watching their video on YouTube. I have used it twice, the second time I made it a bit smaller. Best kit for the price. I think I can get at least one more use out of it. The sticky glue dots that are included to attach the poles are very sticky and work well but are hard to pull apart to reuse the arch. I found that heating the poles a little bit with a hairdryer before pulling the poles apart made everything easier.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Buy a more quality one.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality. This is missing the balloon pump! Also one of the pieces for the arch is completely broken and has a hole on watch side. I'm going to try and make it work because I need it In a few days but I would rather purchase a new one. Darn!
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Durability and easy assembly!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was so durable and withstood a good breeze. I used it over a table and was amazed at the structure and it's ability to stand alone. I have purchased others before only to be disappointed with them collapsing, but not this one! Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Minda Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Cent
customer_reviews.text: First time arch maker here, assembly was easy and the results were beautiful. I added the faux leaves between the balloons which added to the effect. This item was used in a high traffic area for 1 week and is very sturdy. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: iwhuff

customer_reviews.title: Honest Review
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to setup! It took about 1/2 hour to inflate and assemble a swirl type balloon arch. For the reviews saying the poles are straight, yes they are but they bend. Just make sure your clamps are very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Terrific decorative item
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific item. It’s for balloons and comes with clips for them but we wrapped flowers around them. Very study, well made. Super price.
customer_reviews.author: GFP

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier!!!!!!! Really this is amazing! My party was a hit because of it, very very easy to do even for beginners, that's the perfect accent to any party! The Tubes are flexible enough to make the arch, contained enough accessories. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erika M

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome alternative to spending a whole bunch of money on something you will only use once. I have been able to use this twice and everyone has loved it the only downside is it’s a little difficult to put together. After one use it did get kind of flimsy where the poles connect so I don’t see it lasting too much longer.
customer_reviews.author: E.Cole

customer_reviews.title: This thing broke at first touch
customer_reviews.text: This arch has very cheap and fragile plastic pieces, and broke on me very soon after I started putting it together. The tubes don't bend easily and the plastic clamps don't have enough strength to hold on to any table. I had to return it. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MigueP

customer_reviews.title: Love and easy to assemble!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together (make sure you use the glue dots, otherwise it WILL fall apart, lesson learned).... only problem is it is hard to take apart because of the glue adhesive! Loved and will definitely be using over and over for many parties to come.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie N Stueart

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The table clamps don't hold on to the table very well and the poles are difficult to bend into the arch shape. You have to assemble all your balloons on the clips provided and add at once or you'll be constantly putting the arch back on the table of the balloons back on the poles.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Balloon Arch Great Addition to Every Party
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product and I'll keep using for future party's. Balloons definitely add to any party and the balloon arch was commented by all the moms. Highly recommend this product. I blew up the balloons with myself but I might invest in an electric balloon pump for the next party. :)
customer_reviews.author: LorieM

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase yet! So awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I made a beautiful balloon table arch for my daughters birthday with this it was easy I was able to do it by myself . It is adjustable and the extras that come with it was a life saver made it so much faster and easier it was worth way more but an amazing deal and amazing presentation for a party . If I can do it anyone can so so beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: BRITTANY

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very easy to assemble. Do not bend individual tubes, at first i didnt think the tubes would even bend into an arch because they are pretty tough duty, but once you start adding the balloons it starts to arch on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Some places charge $250+ to do balloon designs for parties, we had a great effect using elbow grease. It was a little time consuming because you have to use A LOT of balloons so plan accordingly. We were pressed for time so we didn’t blow up as many as we should but it still looked nice. Everyone commented and asked us who did it. My husband did it all by himself! It’s a great product. I just wonder if we can use again since you have to use glue on the bars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and worked like it should have at first. It was not windy outside, but less than half an hour after we set up, one side of the arch snapped at the part that connected to the table. It caused the other half of the arch to bend and warped the connector part for the table. I was excited to use this, but it ended up being a huge disappointment, as it was used for a surprise birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Flores

customer_reviews.title: Gives your Cake table a touch!
customer_reviews.text: awesome, Awesome, AWESOME ! Loved it ! Made my sons decoration easy, decorative and at an affordable price. I did buy the balloons from another seller on amazon. But the arch is awesome. And I got a lot of compliments from guest. I referred them to this seller to buy one for their kids party too. Definitely reusing it for my other kids parties in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Not worked for me. Table holder is not wide enough to hold the table also pipe is too firm to bend. Tried to make loop but failed. It almost ruined the party.
customer_reviews.author: Ishita

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING !!
customer_reviews.text: I was very very very pleased with my purchase, I had previously bought a different table arch but it did not work at all . I was a little skeptical when I purchased this one, but to my surprise it was all i was needing!! came with all the parts, I didn't use the pump (i have a electrical one) but other than that it was more than perfect !.
customer_reviews.author: Renovacion Carismatica

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: This item was recommended by a friend and am happy I purchased it! So far I have been able to use this item twice. Quick tip; I did look up a how to video on YouTube which was more helpful than the written instructions provided.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DIY Balloon Arch Lit
customer_reviews.text: I love this ballon arch. Super easy to set up. I have a machine that blows up the ballons that I brought from amazon for $20, which aides in a faster setup. I will no longer pay those party planners to decorate anything for me. My son baby shower the lady charge $200 for a ballon arch. Ridiculous. Im handy now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: worked great!
customer_reviews.text: It took me about 2 hours to blow up all of the balloons with the included pump. I pumped up about 50 or so balloons and the arch could probably have used a few more to make it look fuller but I lacked the motivation to do any more. It also came with more balloon clips than I could hope to use. The clamps also worked really well. All in all I do believe you could use this product more than once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Guest loved the arch. Very easy to assemble. Love how many balloon pieces come since they tend to get lost. Recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: RMS

customer_reviews.title: Have several people helping you, makes the process easier.
customer_reviews.text: This balloon Arc is amazing. It is a little annoying to put together so make sure you have someone else helping you but its fairly easy. I also love that it came with a balloon pump to fill the balloons. I held my party outside so some of my balloons popped since it was a windy day. Overall this product is amazing. Everyone loved the way it looked.
customer_reviews.author: Emily ♡

customer_reviews.title: EASY & REUSABLE
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Reusable. I used 100 12-inch balloons from Walmart. Dollar tree balloons work great too. This is a fantastic product. Definitely a great value. This one was assembled outside and it was pretty windy so I wasn’t worried about actually making a nice design. I was just happy to get the arch up with balloons on it. Next time I would like to actually pay attention to the pattern and design of it. Looking forward to our next event.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Table Lockers 🙁
customer_reviews.text: The table arch is nice just what I wanted only reason I don’t give it 5 stars is because they forgot to send the Table Lockers:( if they can send the to me I’ll be more than happy to change my review the poles are very nice and thick!
customer_reviews.author: Stephannie

customer_reviews.title: Added a wow factor to my party
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this product. Easy to put together. We connected the poles, taped them to each other with the included tape, slid the balloons on the clips onto the pole then inserted into the table clamps. The poles are all straight and you will think there is no way they will arch but they will. I used 76 balloons. My guests thought I paid someone to make the arch :)
customer_reviews.author: chronious

customer_reviews.title: Fragile - only works for one time use.
customer_reviews.text: It’s works perfectly the first time but then when I tried the second time, the poles broke and snap easily. I already brought two sets. Confirmed only works the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Letty

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Broke first day I bought it. But I rigged it up because I had to use it that day for a nursing home Christmas event. I emailed company and told them what happened. They replaced the item right away with no charge to me. I would recommend. Not sure why it broke, maybe one bad piece? It arched come with ballon hooks that makes the arch easy!! You don’t hv to tie balloons to arch.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to put together and looks professionally done once completed! I got so many compliments on the arch & people were stunned when I said I did it myself with an amazon kit! My only complaint is that the connections came apart twice and all the balloons fell off. Once I tightened the connections again it was fine. People are already asking to borrow it for their party!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Henry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The arch was easy to assemble and turned out beautiful! I will be able to uses this repeatedly for my kids future birthday parties so I think it’s a good value for the cost. The arch went up quickly, blowing up balloons took the most time. We used about 90 balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it in an official compacity as of yet, I did a mock set up to see how long it takes to set it up. Although there weren't any instructions for assembly, it was pretty easy to figure it out. It took me 5 minutes to attach the clamps to the table and add the poles. I personally don't care for the balloon clips so I wrapped my balloons around the pole instead. All in all, this will come in handy at all my future events and a time saver.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Excited to finally know how to do these things. Haven't used it yet but I did set it up so I know how to when my party rolls around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Spent a lot of money on balloons 🎈 made an organic arch looked perfect the only thing is that since it is was an outside party the wind blew away part of the arch.I would not recommend if doing an outside party! Ruined my main table.I wish there would have been an honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has so many great reviews because they bribe you
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build but so flimsy. Had such a hard time putting this up. Every time one side was on, another would come loose and down would go the balloons. I ended up throwing it away after the party because next time I want an arch I’ll pay a company to build it. Also, all these amazing reviews are due to the company promising you an amazon gift card in exchange for a review. 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: So easy and so beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this arch kit to use for our daughter’s party. It was so easy to use and the balloons looked beautiful. We got many compliments on the balloon arch. So happy that we purchased this instead of hiring someone who would charge me an arm and a leg. Will be reusing this for future parties.
customer_reviews.author: Lolos mommy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product, Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and easy to assemble! I highly recommend spending a little more money and buying the electric pump to fill up balloons. I decided to save money and blow up the balloons myself which was exhausting! Make sure to not bend the poles before assembling them together. This product made my birthday party look spectacular and I'd definitely buy it again and recommend it to a friend. Since our party took place on a rainy/windy day, we did have to tie down the arch, but that was expected. Thankfully it stayed in place throughout the 5 hours of our party. ***Balloon columns not included. Those were purchased from another vendor here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: APrimer:)

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap. Not worth the money. One piece broke right out the box there for making it useless ypu are better off getting some flexible tubing from a hardware store. The clamps dont open enough to attach to my plastic tables. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erika gomez

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it!! Took me a while to figure out bc I thought it wouldn't fold over since the poles are straight but do yourself a favor and add the ballons on 1st and then it's easy to connect!! My daughter will love it and I'll use it as much as I can and order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and way cheaper than party store!
customer_reviews.text: This was way cheaper than party stores and worked just as good! We used it for my sons 1st birthday and will use it again next year. Really easy to assemble and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Primeaux

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: The glue included in the kit did not keep the bars of the arch together, it just kept falling apart.I just turned the arch into columns.
customer_reviews.author: Ledthomas

customer_reviews.title: Best $14.99 I have ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy and so fast to put together! And did I say EASY! It was easy. Beautiful. We can use it again and again. Best party supply you could ever buy. I would have bought it for $29.99 now knowing how easy it came together and beautiful it looks. I am totally giddy over this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worth it!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened it up I was shocked at how difficult it looked. but as I got to putting it together it was very easy and the end product looked amazing. my daughters birthday was a success but this arch was complimented very much.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Broughton

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Poles stayed together fine. Clamps held. They do have to be tight. It's a little tricky getting balloons on. I would watch a couple YouTube videos. They give you plenty of extra rings for more than one use.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: This arch was amazing. I had reservations about it but it worked perfectly. Sturdy and easy to assemble. Perfect for your celebration needs.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this was a great buy, easy to assemble, a bit wabbly might want help but considering for price it will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Genesis V.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Looked really good for my sons prom send off. Easy to assemble and set up. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Candace Liyah Paul

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: 100% recommended! So easy to set up! I did it all by myself! It turned out beautiful! I do recommend you get an air pump though. They are only about $25 here on Amazon. Can’t wait to make more of these! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Don't glue the dots if you plan to reuse poles
customer_reviews.text: The attachment was made of plastic and broke while trying to assemble to table for first time. Not reusable if you secure it with the glue dots like instructed, you can't pull them apart. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: Balloon arch came out wonderful! and was fairly easy to assemble just remember to NOT bend the plastic arch before completely finishing the arch! or it will crack! I see a lot of reviews saying it cracks but I believe this is because of not properly following instructions. Save your money! this 16 dollar set up balloon arch is way worth it compared to spending over $300 on getting it professionally done. Definitely worth buying and trying out for any occasion!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Picon

customer_reviews.title: 1st - 100% Happy
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed your product. This was my first time doing this. Really came out great! Easy to use. Sturdy. I used packing tape to secure the piles together instead of the glue dots. I would buy this agin.
customer_reviews.author: PD2015

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together and can be used again!
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a balloon arch for our baby shower but we didnt think it was worth spending $50 and over to have it done for us. I came across this arch kit and we thought, for the price, why not. Thankfully, it turned out GREAT! Very easy to put together and when the party was over, we were able to easily dismantle it and have it saved for future use.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I had a horrible experience, 2 poles came crocked qnd so the others wouldn't go in, then we finally put it together and it broke at the very middle.
customer_reviews.author: stephany ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it was easy to use and looks great! I got so many compliments from our party guests and my kids love it. I used a six foot table and 20 balloon rings with four balloons each so 80 12' balloons. Also I really like the fact that the company has instructional videos on YouTube so you can see exactly how it's done. The only thing i didn't use was the little hand pump. I recommend using an electric pump to blow balloon.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Sandate

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice, order this for my baby shower. I was skeptical at first but it actually turned out to be pretty easy to assemble and it look great.
customer_reviews.author: Reina 3lizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Balloon Aches not for outside
customer_reviews.text: So sad to say product didn’t work well beefy my guests arrived on the 4 th we had to redo with pvc pipe arches melted and broke I guess they are not for out dir party 😢 Had to throw both of them away
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Samuels

customer_reviews.title: Rainbow Arch Kit
customer_reviews.text: We used it for a birthday party, it served it's purpose but very time consuming (aligning the balloons and keeping them in a specific order). The two sided sticky's provided help but don't make a mistake (your balloons will pop pulling them apart)
customer_reviews.author: MARIO

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money !!
customer_reviews.text: LOVED it! I took two sticks off so it could be smaller but only bc I ran out of balloons but it still looked amazing and really like that you can pick how big or small you want it .... only problem was that the clamp dint fit on my table with the circle thing it came with but we still made it work ! Will def buy another one to have two for next time (: worth the money !
customer_reviews.author: Mariel Gomez

customer_reviews.title: It bends good. Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Love this balloon arch. It did the job well and you can’t bet the price. It’s pretty sturdy and holds ALOT of balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Great for birthday girl 15! We had a pump that made it easy to make the balloons. Highly suggest purchasing one.

customer_reviews.title: Did not curve correctly
customer_reviews.text: Would not curve to fit table. The plastic itself creased when assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Kimi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and durable. Word of advice, if it is your first time doing one, I would do a test run. I waited until last minute and there were some errors.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Healy

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties!
customer_reviews.text: The balloon arch helped make the cake table look beautiful! Simple yet nice!
customer_reviews.author: Vivi

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Omg when i tell you this was the best money i spent, it is! This arch is as easy to assemble and looks great once up.
customer_reviews.author: Mz. Dean

product_meta.title: Balloon Arch Kit Adjustable for Different Table Sizes Birthday, Wedding, Christmas, and Graduation Party
feature_bullets: FREE BALLOON CLIPS: Comes with FREE 50 balloon clips at no cost to help you build a nice balloon arch for your table decoration.Free hand help air pump include(random colored air pump).

BEST QUALITY ON THE MARKET: Unlike the ones with week poles, this balloon arch was redesign with better material that can be re-use for many times. It's the most durable balloon arch for table decoration.
ADJUSTABLE SIZE: This balloon arch is very flexible to fit most of the tables on the market with about 1.57" (4 cm) thickness. The height and width depend on the size of your table.

EASY TO ASSEMBLE AND DISASSEMBLE: Table and balloons are NOT included. It takes no more than 2 minutes to set up this balloon arch frame on the table. It requires minimum effort to disassemble and store into a small place for future uses.
100% SATISFACTION OR MONEY BACK: Contact us for any problems or questions FIRST. We will make sure you get the best solution or full money back if not satisfied.
